title: Spontex Microfibre Cloths for Cleaning | 16 Microfibre Collection Cleaning Cloths | For Use as Dusters & Kitchen Towels | 30 x 30cm | Assorted Colours | 16 Count
features: EFFICIENT: with fibres 100 times smaller than a human hair, the cloths are super efficient, capturing dirt, dust and bacteria that hide in the crevices of surfaces
MULTI-PURPOSE: Can be used dry to absorb dust and polish your surfaces or wet to remove stains and grease
BACTERIA KILLER: thanks to its structure, the microfibre can reach tricky spots on surfaces and removes 99% of bacteria*
EFFECTIVE WITH JUST WATER: the microfibre is effective without the need for cleaning products; ecological and economical
DURABLE AND WASHABLE: our microfibre cleaning cloths are hard-wearing and machine washable at 40°C
description: Spontex Microfibre Collection Cloths are super efficient and long lasting multipurpose cloths. They can be machine washed up to 500 times and used wet or dry for most cleaning tasks around the house including wiping down, dusting and even washing dishes. These multipurpose cloths are very efficient even without detergent removing dirt, grease, bacteria and even viruses* with just water**. Cloth size approx.: 30 x 30 cm. Spontex Microfibre cloths are made up of thousands of tiny fibres, so the number of contact points with the surface is greatly increased compared to non microfibre cloths. This means that each cloth has extraordinary cleaning power that eliminates 99% of bacteria and viruses*. Our Microfibre cloths can be used with just water to clean efficiently and achieve sparkling results, there's no need to use cleaning detergents which may pollute streams and rivers. They are also super resistant and long lasting. They can be washed in the washing machine not once, but up to 500 times, so you can keep using your cloths over and over again. When they are no longer fit for their intended use why not find them a new purpose like cleaning shoes or wiping down your bins. Top Tip: These cloths come in a variety of colours so why not use a specific colour for a specific task or room all around the house. Why not try blue for the loo and pink for the sink? * Removes 99% of E. Coli bacteria from glass surfaces and human coronavirus from tiled surfaces with water only. Tested by an independent laboratory.
